text_block_list.text: Let's deepen our mutual understanding―― It had been a little while since that conversation.
A normal day. Thinking about future training menus, organizing documents, planning future races――
After finishing that, having lunch. Going to the cafeteria and exchanging information and making small talk with colleagues.
A normal day……except for one thing.
I already knew who it was though, because inevitably, she would enter my view. However……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"The Oort Cloud"…… nothing 『Special』…… a 『Person』 and their daily activities……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: But "Observation" is still unfeasible. ……a "Concept"? It exists but "cannot be discerned"……
I suppose she was just observing, so I didn't do anything to try and stop her. But……
But if she was going to do this several days in a row, it was probably a good idea to talk to her. Rather, since we have the chance――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Big Bang"……I've been noticed…… Neo Universe's 『Heart Skipped a Beat』……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: …………。 ……"Stabilization". ……Haaaaa……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Yes, 『Closer』. ……"Observation" will continue at close range.
Saying that, Neo Universe once again continued staring at me. Although it was difficult to understand her words, it was probably possible to understand her actions.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: (……"METI"……? Trainer is trying to read the "trajectory"……?)

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: (……I need to "Observe" more closely…… If I miss it, it'll be like a "Shooting Star"……)
As if to make sure she missed nothing, her restless gaze continued to focus on me.
When I first met her, it seemed like she had this unique atmosphere that made her seem aloof and out of reach, but now――
Seeing her like this, she seemed more like an innocent, curious puppy……though thinking that might be a little rude.
Looking at Neo Universe like that, I couldn't help but smile.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Today we're 『Outside School』. 『Different』 from normal…… that's why, Trainer too……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: …… Trainer. Neo Universe "seeks" to go on a 『Walk』.
On Neo Universe's suggestion, we decided to go for a walk. For now, we decided to just pick a random store……
……There was no particular conversation though.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……A "Phenomenon" that can't be 『Explained』. It's necessary for it to 『Resolve』 by 『Itself』……
She probably meant 『I want to solve this myself』……I guess. There was definitely something bothering her, but it didn't seem to be a serious issue.
If that's the case, then there's no reason to worry. Leaving the shopping mall, we continued the leisurely stroll.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……『Hydration』 required. "Polaris" is not visible, but there is a 『Destination』.
『I'm thirsty』 is probably what she meant. That was easy to understand――so easy, I couldn't help but smile.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"Satisfied", it seems……"Guidance" was smooth. Part of Trainer's "cycle"……?
Neo Universe finished drinking her juice.
She was……probably asking if this was my favorite shop or how often I came. Judging by her expression it was probably the latter.
choice_data_list: Um……once in a while I guess?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……I see……
Seems like I was correct.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"Psc"……on the surface of the water……they're sticking their mouths out……do they require "Replenishment"?
I looked out on to the lake and saw fish gathered at the surface. No doubt, she was asking 『Do they want food?』……!
choice_data_list: They should be selling some nearby!

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ………… ……Mmm. Neo Universe wants to "seek" it.
It really turned out to be an easy-going time, wandering without a goal in mind. Neo Universe's expression had remained unchanged, but――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: …………Neo Universe wasn't thinking about whether it was 『Fun』……
It didn't seem like she was going to say it wasn't fun. She was thinking about something else……I guess that's what it means?
She really was a mysterious girl. She had a unique atmosphere, and sometime it seemed she had a vague presence――But――
The current Neo Universe seemed to be struggling with this question. She just seemed like a normal Uma Musume who didn't understand much about herself……
I laughed at that gap between personalities

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: (………… Trainer is always 『Thinking』. Always "Oscillating".)

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: (……It's 『Mysterious』. Unlike 『Other People』……not creating a "Vacuum")
I once again felt a gaze. Once again it was from the Uma Musume in front of me. Communication might not be smooth, but this was fine in it's own way――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Affirmative. Neo Universe will 『Return』 with Trainer.
……it seemed like this would be kind of fun.
